'''v0.13.0 alpha build 4'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2015/11/changelog-for-013-build-3.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: Changelog for 0.13 build 4!|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref> is the fourth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.13.0 alpha|v0.13.0]].

== Additions ==
=== Skin packs ===
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[Biome Settlers Skin Pack 1]].

== Changes ==

* Block lag significantly reduced
* Updated the textures of all [[door]]s in the inventory
* [[Ghast]]s and [[slime]]s now have a higher spawn rate
* [[Tripwire]] outputs power when broken with anything other than shears

== Fixes ==
* Localized the "New" button
* [[Skeleton]]s now burn during daytime
* Fixed [[apple]]s inflicting poison
* [[Minecart]]s placed on a [[powered rail]] next to an opaque block will now move in the right direction
* Fixed [[detector rail]]s saving their ON/OFF state incorrectly</onlyinclude>
